DataElement.preferredName: Female Gender Childbearing Potential Negation Pregnancy Lactating Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to questions which are necessary to allow a person to participate in a clinical study confirming that a female with the potential of becoming pregnant, is not pregnant or producing milk as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Female Gender Childbearing Potential Negation Pregnancy Lactating Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of female._An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth._An indication that the subject is currently producing milk._Having been established or verified._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of female.:An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant.

Concepts.definition: An individual who reports belonging to the cultural gender role distinction of female.
An indicator as to whether the female subject has the potential to become pregnant.

Property.preferredName: Negation Pregnancy Lactating Confirmation Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.:An indication that the subject is currently producing milk.:Having been established or verified.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.
An indication that the subject is currently producing milk.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.
